definition: to die together in the name of love/to sacrifice oneself for love
to be buried with the dead/to die for a cause

sentences.english: Duan Weiping pretended to be with Zhu Dan love, cheat Zhu Dan drink poison.
sentences.chinese: 段伟平假装要跟朱丹殉情，骗朱丹喝下毒药。

definition: to commit suicide by cutting one's own throat
lit. to rest and fly together (idiom)/fig. to live in each other's pockets/to be inseparable
to act out of personal considerations/to show partiality
to make a pledge to be married, without parents' approval
to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
ready to die to preserve one's chastity
unswerving in one's loyalty (idiom); faithful and constant
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to bury sth along with the dead/sacrificial grave goods
to stay together/to rely on one another
